articles.author: Robert Ramsey
articles.title: Baldur's Gate 3 Physical Deluxe Edition Announced, Is Two Discs on PS5 - Push Square
articles.description: Comes with a soundtrack and more
articles.content: Larian Studios has (finally) announced the physical release of Baldur's Gate 3. The so-called Deluxe Edition comes with the game on two (!) PS5 discs, which are packaged along with a bunch of extras.… [+633 chars]

articles.title: How wild monkeys 'laundered' for science could undermine research - Nature.com
articles.description: Demand is fuelling an illegal trade. But smuggled monkeys carry diseases that can disrupt experiments and lead to unreliable data.
